release_notes.en-US: we fix a bug of download

description.en-US: ❗️❗️❗️NOTE ❗️❗️❗️ ✨This browser extension is an independent project and is not related to official Udemy website or application in any ways. This is solely our development intended to provide some functionality not provided by official Udemy. We are making user experience better. 👍👍👍 What is this Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™? 🎞️ This extension enables you to download and save Udemy courses and lecture videos online to your laptop/computer with just ONE CLICK for FREE. You can download course videos of a course in ONE CLICK. It supports downloading high-quality formats (4k) of videos. In fact, we always choose to download the best quality video available for the course or the lecture. 🎒 A red download icon will be displayed at the bottom of the video after you install this downloader; you can click it to download the video. 🎒 Another red button will be displayed at the top right of the course playlist page after you install this downloader; you can click it to download all videos of the course. It's EASY, FAST, and FREE. Enjoy it! 🚀 Tips: Udemy may sometimes be referred to as Udemi, Udemz, Umedy, Udamy, Udmy, or Udmey, so you can call this extension Udemi Downloader, Udemz Downloader, Umedy Downloader, Udamy Downloader, Udmy Downloader, or Udmey Downloader too. 🥇🥇🥇 Why do you need this Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™? ✅ ONE CLICK download and save from Udemy online, easy. 🎒 A red download icon will be displayed at the bottom of the video after you install this downloader; you can click it to download the video. 🎒 Another red button will be displayed at the top right of the course playlist page after you install this downloader; you can click it to download all videos of the course. BULK, MASS, or MULTIPLE downloads of the course lecture resources at once. NO need to copy and paste course URLs, NO advanced settings required. JUST ONE CLICK. ✅ Safe download, no registration, just use it anonymously, best data privacy: Absolutely anonymous. You do NOT need to register an account for this add-on to download course lecture videos from Udemy. Just download anonymously online; we do not collect any user data. There are NO ads, NO spyware, NO malware, NO VPN, and it is easy to uninstall. 🔒 Tips: You still need to log in to Udemy. ✅ All FREE for downloading course lecture videos from Udemy. It’s totally free. You do NOT need to pay—NO cost, NO registration. 👻 Absolutely anonymous, safe, and protected tool. We do not require any credentials, passwords, etc., and do not collect any user data. The downloader doesn’t require any registration or payments; it is absolutely free. ✅ Support for Edge Browser for PC Windows and Mac OS This Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™ works on the Edge browser of any PC OS, with ONE CLICK course lecture video download and save. For example, it supports Windows (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11) and Mac OS (MacBook Pro). It works for both desktop and laptop computers too. 💻 ✅ High quality downloading media content (course videos, lecture videos) from Udemy This Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™ supports downloading media content (course videos, lecture videos) and other media content on Udemy in the best quality, for example: 4K, full HD, 1080p, full size, full quality, MP4 format. 🎼🎬 Unlike downloads on a phone, the videos downloaded by this Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™ will not expire on your PC. ✅ Tech support online 💬 If you have any questions, you can contact us via the email provided on the addon's help page (accessible by clicking the addon icon on the addon management page). Please mention “Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™” in the title. We will respond within 12 hours. We will keep it updated to the latest version to ensure it works. 📩 NOTICE: You must refresh the page after the extension has been installed to ensure the download button appears. ✍️✍️✍️ How to use this addon? 🌍 Go to the Udemy (www.udemy.com) website and view the video on the course page or lecture page. ⬇️ 🌍 Click the red downloader icon on the page (one at the bottom of the video, another at the top right of the course page). The current course video or all videos of the course will be downloaded and saved to your desktop or laptop computer (If the download icon does not appear, please refresh the page). ⬇️ ✴️✴️✴️ Disclaimer This browser extension is an independent project and is not related to official Udemy website or application. This software is intended to help you download Udemy courses for personal use only. Sharing the content of your subscribed courses is strictly prohibited under Udemy Terms of Use. Each and every course on Udemy is subjected to copyright infringement. This software does not magically download any paid course available on Udemy, you need to provide your Udemy login credentials to download the courses you have enrolled in. Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™ downloads the lecture videos by simply using the source of the video player returned to the user by Udemy after proper authentication, you can also do the same manually. Many download managers use same method to download videos on a web page. This app only automates the process of a user doing this manually in a web browser. Enjoy the world of Udemy anytime, anywhere for offline viewing. Use it at your own pace directly, without limitations, safely and reliably with just one click. Best for you, especially if you are a learning student. 🚀🚀🚀 🛣️ 🛣️ 🛣️ ROAD MAP Build a downloader to download and save subtitle, captions, certificate, note, coursework. 🎥 Udemy course video downloader online – UdemyFetcher™ is a free alternative to extensions such as: Inovideo, udeler, Udemy downloader gui, allavsoft,etc. batch download.
